head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths CUTTITTA, FREDERICK F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths CUTTITTA, FREDERICK F.

block.p: CUTTITTA--Frederick F., on April 4, 2007. Professor Emeritus of Education, Brooklyn College CUNY. Devoted brother of Carmel Santoro, cherished fiance of Antoinette Crapanzano. Loving uncle of Joseph Santoro, Angela and Ronald Dowd, Sarah and Michael Carter. Greatuncle of Michael, Samantha, Edward and Marianne. Devoted stepfather of Thomas and Katie Montalbano. Reposing at Barrett Funeral Home, 424 W. 51 St NYC. Mass of the resurrection, Tuesday 10 am, Holy Trinity Church 213 W. 82nd St., NYC. Entombment, St. Charles Cemetery. Viewing Monday 2-4 and 7-9 pm only.
